review_title: Circling the drain and a lot of blamestorming
pros: The patients are great.  That is about it really.
cons: They are stuck in 1974 in terms of cutting edge therapies.  Upper management is dreadful and their decisions have run things into the ground.  The facility is never close to being full.  They can't be making money.  Morale is the worst of any place I have ever been, any little thing goes wrong and they'll find a scapegoat fast.  Really don't take a job here.  Pay is terrible and the environment is so tense.  Your supervisor will not help you either, and they have one poor soul in HR now who can't really help you.  Patient care IS suffering.

pros: Livengrin has been implementing innovative treatment options for over 50 years.  We tailor treatment to meet the individual's needs and offer evidence based and holistic approaches that work.  We have staff who are dedicated to making sustainable recovery possible through professional, accessible and successful treatment options.  Livengrin strives for clinical excellence.
cons: There exists a small group of disgruntled employees who continually find fault with the program, management, etc. and it is unfortunate that someone would choose a forum such as this to display hostility for the organization.  It has been my experience that if you show up and do your job, the work environment can be quite pleasant.
